title: I see ads all of the time for Alabama tourist sites such as hotels, beaches, golfing, etc.  I\'ve always wondered why they are spending so much in our market where we offer all of that (and more).  Are these ads being subsidized by BP as a result of that huge oil spill years ago?  I don\'t remember seeing any before that event.  If so, how much longer do our local attractions have to battle this unfair competition?
